Package it.polimi.ingsw.view.GUI

Class GUI

java.lang.Object
javafx.application.Application
it.polimi.ingsw.view.GUI.GUI
public class GUI extends javafx.application.Application
main class that dinamically builds and orchestrates the GUI using javafx

    • showScoreboardView

      public static void showScoreboardView(Map<String,Integer> playerPoints, String winner)
      shows the end_view.fxml window, that shows the points of all the players and the winner
      Parameters:
      playerPoints - a map associating a player's nickname to its points
      winner - a string containing the winner's nickname

    • updateGameView

      public static void updateGameView(GameUpdate gameUpdate, List<GuiParts> toRefresh)
      updates the game_view.fxml window, following an action from any of the players
      Parameters:
      gameUpdate - a GameUpdate object containing the updated game params
      toRefresh - a list of GuiParts to refresh
